description: A business-oriented expert responsible for configuring and aligning the system with business processes on the customer side.
A technical expert at the customer organization responsible for implementing or customizing solutions, typically via code.
A support specialist at the software vendor providing troubleshooting, guidance, and resolution of issues.
A developer working for the software vendor, involved in building or maintaining the platform or extensions.
Any other role not listed, such as project managers, testers, or third-party consultants.
